articles.title: GM slashes price of 2023 Chevy Bolt, making it the cheapest EV in America - Yahoo Finance
articles.description: The 2023 Chevrolet Bolt could be the cheapest EV you can buy in America — with a caveat.
articles.content:
The 2023 Chevrolet Bolt will be the cheapest EV you can buy in America with a caveat.
Earlier this week General Motors (GM) revealed pricing for the 2023 version of the Bolt EV. The base 1LT and bet… [+3125 chars]

articles.description: Conservatives on Twitter slammed President Joe Biden's Thursday night speech calling for new 'assault weapons' bans in the wake of tragedies like the Texas school shooting.
articles.content: Conservatives and gun rights supporters were alarmed with President Joe Bidens Thursday evening address encouraging a new "assault weapons" ban in America. Despite the president's claim he would neve… [+5708 chars]
